long_description: Admire Minetest in a low-detail, colorful style with this cute texture pack. Build, mine and more with simplistic and smooth blocks. See the official forum for a complete list of supported games and mods.
name: plastic_textures
short_description: A simplistic texture pack that portrays the world of Minetest in bright, solid colors and low detail.
title: Plastic Texture Pack
